name: RigelToken
description: Rigel Protocol is a decentralized protocol of several DeFi products. RigelProtocol is completely considered, initiated, developed, and driven by the Rigelprotocol community.

name: WBNB Token
description: Wrapped BNB a wrapped version of the BNB native tokens on the BEP-20 standard on the Binance Smart Chain. Not to be confused with BNB Native Token on the BSC Chain.

name: WAVAX Token
description: Avalanche is a high throughput smart contract blockchain platform. Validators secure the network through a proof-of-stake consensus protocol. It is said to be fast, low cost, and environmental friendly. Mainnet was launched in September 21, 2020. Since then, the platform has grown to secure over 100+ individual projects, $1.4M+ of AVAX burned (reducing supply), 950+ individual block-producing validators, and over 500k+ community members around the globe. Decentralized finance (DeFi) applications can be found on Avalanche such as Pangolin, TraderJoe, and more.

name: BNB
description: Binance Coin (BNB) is an exchange-based token created and issued by the cryptocurrency exchange Binance

name: BUSD Token
description: Binance USD (BUSD) is a stable coin pegged to USD that has received approval from the New York State Department of Financial Services (NYDFS).

name: USDT Token
description: Tether is a stablecoin pegged to the US Dollar. A stablecoin is a type of cryptocurrency whose value is pegged to another fiat currency like the US Dollar or to a commodity like Gold.

name: AXSToken
description: AXS is the governance token for the Axie Infinity game. Token holders will be able to shape and vote for the direction of the game universe. This is unlike traditional games where all decisions are made by the game developers. AXS holders will be able to stake their tokens to earn more AXS and even vote for governance proposals.
